result.eng: He threw on his uniform and left.
result.ga: Bhuail sé a éide uime agus d'imigh
result.orig: Bhuail sé a éide uime agus d'imigh
result.html: Bhuail sé a éide uime agus d'imighHe threw on his uniform and left.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail sé a éide uime agus d'imiġHe threw on his uniform and left.

result.html: Bhí a mhacra uimeHis sons were around him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ṁacra uimeHis sons were around him.

result.eng: He was wearning a prisoner's uniform.
result.html: Bhí éide an phríosúnaigh uimeHe was wearning a prisoner's uniform.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí éide an ṗríosúnaiġ uimeHe was wearning a prisoner's uniform.

result.ga: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sin
result.orig: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sin
result.html: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sinWhy did you do that?
result.ponchtml: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sinWhy did you do that?

result.eng: He put on his work clothes.
result.ga: Chuir sé uime a chulaith oibre
result.orig: Chuir sé uime a chulaith oibre
result.html: Chuir sé uime a chulaith oibreHe put on his work clothes.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé uime a ċulaiṫ oibreHe put on his work clothes.

result.eng: This is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
result.ga: Uime sin dhíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin é
result.orig: Uime sin dhíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin é
result.html: Uime sin dhíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin éThis is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
result.ponchtml: Uime sin ḋíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin éThis is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
